name: Minuscular - a mixed media adventure
description:
!! Updated version includes some fixes (UI, some missing colliders, etc (what an amateur hour))!!

Minuscular is a simple 2D point & click game demo I made while stuck at home in corona lockdown. I wanted to do a mixed media thing so all the graphics are hand painted and -drawn.  

Player navigates a tiny person through three little levels by clicking on objects to reveal the path. Movement is controlled by arrow keys, objects that are clickable make the cursor change and esc shuts the game down. That's it.

Sounds might be a bit loud so headphone users beware. 

Also this is one of my first complete game demos and my first download to itch.io so I'm new to this stuff.
